resourceTemplates.name: get-sun-times-today
resourceTemplates.title: Get today's sunrise and sunset
resourceTemplates.description: Returns today's sunrise, sunset, and twilight times for a specific latitude and longitude (UTC).

resourceTemplates.name: get-sun-times-for-date
resourceTemplates.title: Get sunrise and sunset for specific date
resourceTemplates.description: Returns sunrise, sunset, and twilight times for a given date at the specified coordinates (UTC). Use ISO date (yyyy-mm-dd) or 'today'.

resourceTemplates.name: get-sun-times-for-date-iso8601
resourceTemplates.title: Get sun times in ISO8601 for date
resourceTemplates.description: Same as above, but returns times in ISO8601 instead of AM/PM. Useful for parsing and calculations.
